name: workspace-canvas
description: Coordinate multiple Claude AI agents in an infinite canvas workspace

scripts.dev:electron: npm run build:main && wait-on http://localhost:3000 && electron .
scripts.build:png: qlmanage -t -s 1024 -o build/ build/icon.svg && mv build/icon.svg.png build/icon.png && sips -z 1024 1024 build/icon.png
scripts.build:all-icons: npm run build:png && npm run build:icons
scripts.test: npm run test:renderer && npm run test:main
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e
scripts.dist: npm run build:all && pnpm install --prod && npx electron-builder && pnpm install
scripts.dist:mac: npm run build:all && pnpm install --prod && npx electron-builder --mac && pnpm install
scripts.dist:win: npm run build:all && pnpm install --prod && npx electron-builder --win && pnpm install
scripts.dist:all: npm run build:all && pnpm install --prod && npx electron-builder --mac --win --linux && pnpm install
scripts.dist:win: npm run build:all && pnpm install --prod && npx electron-builder --win && pnpm install
scripts.dist:linux: npm run build:all && pnpm install --prod && npx electron-builder --linux && pnpm install
scripts.dist:all: npm run build:all && pnpm install --prod && npx electron-builder --mac --win --linux && pnpm install
